Description: name given by NASA, typically a year with a letter-number combination
minimum estimated diameter in kilometer for each asteroid - mean of 0.13km with a large outlier at 37.9km
maximum estimated diameter in kilometer for each asteroid - mean of 0.28km with a large outlier at 84.7km
velocity of asteroid relative to Earth in kilometers per hour - mean of 48,100 km/hr and median of 44,200 km/hr
describes the luminosity of the asteroid in units H; a smaller H implies a large diameter in general - mean value of 23.5H; min of 9.23H; max of 33.2H
boolean feature that describes whether the asteroid is hazardous - 10% are true
Data Type: binary value where 0 is equal to False and 1 is equal to True
